column2: ask4mm@aol.com, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: 1800 mg of Gabapetin(600mg 3X day) was prescribed for me to help with my severe back and leg pain issues.I took 2 capsules of 300mg each 3 X a day for about 1 month....I needed to take narcotic pain pills in addition to these to manage the pain.Then I needed a refill....they gave me 600mg hard tablets to take 3 X per day.I have been on these about a week, they are totally different....I am so wobbly and out of it.....can hardly type.....need to sleep but fight to stay up....but....the good part...absolutely no pain....and no need for narcotics.Isn't it weird that these are so different?I just hope this isn't permanent....you would think after a week that these symptoms would subside.I am using my mom's walker to get around without tipping over....But, as far as pain....none!Marcia
